name: Colin McRae Rally 04
description: Based of the NFS most wanted installer.
notes: Highly recommend a no cd crack or something

script.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Need for Speed Carbon/NFSC.exe

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Need for Speed Carbon/NFSC.exe
files:
- file: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mfc42 d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    description: Installing dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: 'true'
- task:
    executable: file
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
